Issue.creator: jsmitchell
Issue.summary: Investigate discrepancy between volume of sent TP_PROCESS_REQUESTS and transaction execution count
Issue.description: In the LR tests, we are seeing an unexpectedly high volume of TP_PROCESS_REQUEST messages sent from the validators to the transaction processors vs. the received TP_PROCESS_RESPONSE messages and the count of executed transactions. The expected behavior is that these are all the same. Investigate the source of the discrepancy and verify that the execution of transactions is not resulting in a large number of duplicate/retried messages.
